content: but with bbl instead of tbl r15 r16 single_crochet 32 chain 1 turn r17 r74 repeat r2 r16 almost 5 repeats the last special stitch will be crbl r75 repeat r2 but with bbl instead of tbl r76 single_crochet 32 fasten_off leaving a 4 tail to weave in your ends panel 2 repeat r1 r71 almost 5 repeats the last special stitch will be xbl r72 repeat r2 but with crbl instead of tbl r73 single_crochet 32 fasten_off leaving a long tail to join your panels finishing block your panels using your preferred method join panels using the mattress stitch weave in ends if you have additional yarn fringe could be added to the foundation row mattress stitch 1 lay your panels right side facing up 2 thread through the 1st st back to front on panel 1 do the same on panel 2 3 on panel 1 thread through the 1st st front to back come back up through the next stitch back to front do the same on panel 2 4 repeat step 3 until you reach the end tightening the seam every few sts
